justification: Doesn’t model Team B’s motives: B values upside and already has a better TE, so swapping Thompson for a depth TE and volatile WR is unlikely. Rationale is internally inconsistent—claims TE upgrade while asking for a downgrade (Liam < Isaiah). Also misfits Team A’s preference for reliable, workhorse RBs by targeting a volatile committee back. Explanation is generic and unspecific.
